IF $GET(YSUB(YI))'="" QUIT:YSUBS(YI)'=YSUB(YI) QUIT SUBSCR ;ANZEIGE DER ORDNER ;advertisement the ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; History: ; 28-Oct-2005 JW SR13074: Exchange Rate type ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- IF $PIECE(YFIX,",",3)'="" QUIT:$TRANSLATE($PIECE(YFIX,",",3),"""")'=YSUBS(1) ;FALSCHE POSITION IF $PIECE(YFIX,",",3)="" SET YPOS=YSUBS(1) NEW LINK,YKEYY SET LINK=0 ;KEIN LINK IN PRODUKTION ;no within production IF YDATEI="INAUFPXL" IF $PIECE(YFIX,",",2)'="" IF YPOS'="" DO ;SOLL EIN LINK ANGEZEIGT WERDEN??? ;uni- . SET ^WWW126(YM,"INAUFP",YBED,1,1)=$PIECE(YFIX,",",2) ;VORGABE FÃœR ANZEIGE ;default to Show . SET ^WWW126(YM,"INAUFP",YBED,2,1)=YPOS . IF $DATA(^INAUFPT(YM,$PIECE(YFIX,",",2),YPOS)) SET LINK=1 . QUIT . ;vvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvv DISABLED BLOCK START . IF $PIECE($GET(^INAUFP(YM,$PIECE(YFIX,",",2),YPOS,1)),Y,7)=3 SET LINK=1 QUIT . IF $PIECE($GET(^INAUFP(YM,$PIECE(YFIX,",",2),YPOS,1)),Y,7)=4 SET LINK=1 QUIT ;WENN PRODUKTION, DANN MIT LINK IN PRODUKTION . ;^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ DISABLED BLOCK END IF YDATEI="INANGPXL" IF $PIECE(YFIX,",",2)'="" IF YPOS'="" DO ;SOLL EIN LINK ANGEZEIGT WERDEN??? ;uni- . SET ^WWW126(YM,"INANGP",YBED,1,1)=$PIECE(YFIX,",",2) ;VORGABE FÃœR ANZEIGE ;default to Show . SET ^WWW126(YM,"INANGP",YBED,2,1)=YPOS . IF $DATA(^INANGPT(YM,$PIECE(YFIX,",",2),YPOS)) SET LINK=1 . QUIT . ;vvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvv DISABLED BLOCK START . IF $PIECE($GET(^INANGP(YM,$PIECE(YFIX,",",2),YPOS,1)),Y,7)=3 SET LINK=1 QUIT . IF $PIECE($GET(^INANGP(YM,$PIECE(YFIX,",",2),YPOS,1)),Y,7)=4 SET LINK=1 QUIT ;WENN PRODUKTION, DANN MIT LINK IN PRODUKTION . QUIT . ;^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ DISABLED BLOCK END SET YTITLE="" WRITE YCR WRITE "
" SET YOFFS=YFIX ;OFFSETVARIABLE IF YOFFS'="" SET YOFFS=YOFFS_"," SET YIX=YI DO ;PRUEFEN AUF ORDNER MINUS ;upon minus . SET YQ=0 . IF YSUBMAX'=YI DO . . IF YSUB(YI)=YSUBS(YI) IF $DATA(@(YSEARCH(YI)))=11!($DATA(@(YSEARCH(YI)))=10) DO ;MINUS ENTHALTEN ;minus include . . . SET YFELD=$GET(@(YSEARCH(YI))) IF YFELD'="" FOR YX=1:1 QUIT:$PIECE(YRECORD,",",YX)="" IF +$PIECE(YRECORD,",",YX)'=0 SET $PIECE(YITEM,Y,+$PIECE(YRECORD,",",YX))=$PIECE(YFELD,Y,+$PIECE(YRECORD,",",YX)) .
